job_description:
• Research, develop, and integrate advanced modeling algorithms for photonic devices based on evolving customer and product requirements.
• Strong proficiency in C++ programming, with experience in developing commercial engineering software.
• Excellent technical communication skills—written, verbal, and presentation.
• Preferred: Experience with parallel processing/GPU computing, inverse design, machine learning algorithms, cloud platforms, and Agile/Lean development processes.
• Analytical thinker with strong problem-solving skills.
• Design and implement high-performance C++ solutions for photonic CAD/CAE software used by industry-leading companies.
• Apply modern software development practices to deliver robust, scalable, and efficient solutions.
• Ensure code quality and maintainability through rigorous refactoring, code reviews, and regression testing.
